name: Bob's Extremely Cheap Mirror Adventure
description:
( This Project is a submission for the Gamedev.js Jam 2021 )

Help Bob on his extremely cheap adventure to destroy every single mirror in the world ( 8 that is )

Hello Everyone! Welcome to my first Itch.io Game! This Game only has 8 levels and is a  short 5 minute game that can be played on your browser! ( no download needed! ) Keep in mind, this is my first game on this website, so there's bound to be glitches and bugs. Thank you for reading and have fun playing!
